---
title: "Preparation data to upload"
output: html_notebook
---



```{r}
require(tidyverse)
require(readxl)

renta_hid_arg <- read_excel('../results/argentina/renta_de_la_tierra_hidrocarburifera_arg.xlsx',
                            sheet = 'raw_data') %>% 
  arrange(anio) %>% 
  mutate(row = row_number()) %>% 
  select(row, anio, variable, valor) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(valor)) %>% 
  pivot_wider( names_from = variable, values_from = valor) %>% 
  select(-row)

ipc_arg <- read_excel('../results/argentina/renta_de_la_tierra_hidrocarburifera_arg.xlsx',
                            sheet = 'ipc') %>% 
  select(anio, IPC_18)
tc_arg <- read_excel('../results/argentina/renta_de_la_tierra_hidrocarburifera_arg.xlsx',
                            sheet = 'tipo_cambio') %>% 
  select(anio, TCc)

df_join <- renta_hid_arg %>% 
  left_join(ipc_arg) %>% 
  left_join(tc_arg) %>% 
  mutate('PBI hidrocarburifero' = `Producción de petróleo crudo` *`Precio del mercado interno del petróleo crudo` )

head(df_join)
write.csv(df_join, '../results/argentina/data_renta_hidrocarburifera_arg_para_carga.csv', row.names = F)
```
